text: Hello, my name is Cynthia Cherise Murphy and we have been loyal HubSpot users for 2 years. I feel honestly overwhelmed by not utilizing our software to the fullest extent. We are running a student team and another brand, and I really need help to pay someone to make sure our email workflows are running properly between HubSpot and Shopify. I can't really find experts on Fiverr. Thank you so much!

Hi Cynthia I’m not a user of Shopify but I’m a HubSpot developer and have been working with almost all aspects of HubSpot for over 10 years. If someone doesn’t reach out with Shopify experience feel free to reach out tomorrow and I we can see if I can be of assistance. I love a good challenge and always looking to grow. Best wishes.
